original_title: Lo repet√≠s hacia adentro con la fuerza de un trueno
overview: "The sensitivity allows human beings to unite and connect through sympathy and relationships, as a fine layer that perceives and decodes non-verbal impressions; in other words, allows them to return to a nonspecific and uncoded state in which bodies vibrate in unison." (the8fest)
title: You Repeat it to Yourself with the Strength of a Thunder
